alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Huron; Morrow (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Richland, southern Huron, northwestern Ashland, northeastern Morrow and eastern Crawford Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Washington to near Shelby to near Galion. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Galion, Shelby, Willard, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, New London, Plymouth, New Washington, Hayesville, Savannah, Greenwich, Bailey Lakes, Tiro, Mifflin, Nankin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
